statements: SELECT * FROM medication_errors;
SELECT error_id, error_description FROM medication_errors WHERE error_type = 'prescribing';
SELECT error_id, error_type, error_date FROM medication_errors ORDER BY error_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_errors FROM medication_errors WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT AVG(error_id) AS average_error_id FROM medication_errors WHERE error_type = 'dispensing';
SELECT * FROM medication_errors WHERE error_type = 'prescribing' ORDER BY error_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT error_id, patient_id, error_description FROM medication_errors WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY error_id ASC
SELECT * FROM medication_errors WHERE patient_id = 2002 AND error_type = 'administration'
SELECT error_id, error_description, error_date FROM medication_errors WHERE error_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY error_date
SELECT * FROM medication_errors WHERE error_type = 'dispensing' OR error_type = 'monitoring'
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT error_description, error_date FROM medication_errors WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY error_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' AND patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT error_id, error_description, error_date FROM medication_errors WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Medication_Errors WHERE error_type = 'Prescription Error';
SELECT error_id, error_description FROM Medication_Errors ORDER BY error_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Staff WHERE staff_role = 'Doctor' AND staff_department = 'Cardiology';
SELECT staff_id, staff_name, staff_role, staff_department FROM Medical_Staff WHERE staff_role = 'Nurse';
SELECT * FROM Medication_Errors WHERE error_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT error_id, error_description, error_type FROM Medication_Errors WHERE error_type = 'Dispensing Error'
SELECT error_type, COUNT(*) AS error_count FROM Medication_Errors GROUP BY error_type ORDER BY error_count DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender != 'Male'
SELECT * FROM Medical_Staff WHERE staff_role = 'Doctor' AND staff_department = 'Cardiology'
SELECT * FROM MedicationErrors;
SELECT id, error_description, error_type FROM MedicationErrors ORDER BY error_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medical_record_number FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT error_description FROM MedicationErrors WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM MedicationErrors;
SELECT error_description, error_type, error_date FROM MedicationErrors ORDER BY error_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medical_record_number FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, specialty, contact_number FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';

SELECT mr.patient_name, merr.error_description, hp.provider_name FROM Patients mr JOIN ErrorReports er ON mr.patient_id = er.patient_id JOIN MedicationErrors merr ON er.error_id = merr.id JOIN HealthcareProviders hp ON er.provider_id = hp.provider_id WHERE er.report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medication_errors;
SELECT patient_id, error_description FROM medication_errors WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT error_description, error_date FROM medication_errors WHERE error_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT medication_name FROM medications WHERE medication_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM medication_errors WHERE error_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY error_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT medication_name, medication_description FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age >= 50 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT error_type_name, error_type_description FROM error_types WHERE error_type_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT e.error_description, p.patient_name, el.log_description FROM medication_errors e JOIN patients p ON e.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN error_logs el ON e.error_id = el.error_id;
